entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries near midnight. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h becoming north 20 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
